item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us for an evening of fun as we watch a new play at the Rocester Opera House! We will meet at 7:30 in the lobby! Tickets can be rsvp. at the Rochester Opera house.

 

UNITED WE STAND

Salute Our Armed Forces

Join us with friends and family as the Rochester Opera House pays tribute to all of our brave service men and women from the United States of America, with a musical revue of popular songs, dances and skits that inspired our Armed Forces during World War I to the present. The show includes memorable, timeless music and skits made famous by the Andrews Sisters, Bing Crosby, Sophie Tucker, Gypsy Rose Lee, Bob Hope, Gene Kelly and much, much more.

We honor our soldiers and the mission of the USO, which continues to be a link of compassion and reassurance that America cares, remembers and supports the service and sacrifice of those, who defend her. Co-Director Kelli Connors characterizes United We Stand as a celebration of Americana, beginning with the dance hall days, highlighting the music and times of World Wars I and II and culminating in a musical tribute to our Armed Forces. She enthusiastically comments, "If you think patriotism is a thing of the past, think again, it is in full swing at the Rochester Opera House with rollicking music, energetic dancing, vaudevillian comedy and heartwarming sentiment." She adds, "This is a show for the young, the old, servicemen and veterans alike and a great get-together for family entertainment that will inspire our youth toward community efforts and a sense of belonging to something grand!"

United We Stand is directed by Anthony Ejarque and Kelli Connors with live band directed by Kathy Fink and choreography by Kelli Connors.  

Veterans and all members of the Armed Forces, we invite you to proudly wear your uniform as the Rochester Opera House salutes you! Present your valid military ID and receive 20% off your ticket. Discount valid only by phone (603) 335-1992 or in person at the ROH Box Office.
